senate.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the smaller and more important of the two parts of the government with the power to make laws, in countries such as the US, Australia, and France
senate.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a similar part of the government in many US states
senate.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the governing council at some universities
senate.translation[1].definitions[0].def: in the US and some other countries, the upper part of the two parts of government with the power to make laws
